projects.title: Trivie for Business
projects.description: Trivie for Business is a SaaS-based web app developed during my time at Trivie, Inc. The app is made up of both a client-facing mobile game and backend Management System for managing content, users, and general moderation. The app aids enterprise companies by using trivia and gamification to make employee training and reinforcement fun. I contributed to the planning, implementation and maintenance of this application. This includes all design, UI/UX, and the front end tech stack. Tech inlucded: AngularJS, CSS (for complex animations) and implementation of a RESTful Django API.

projects.title: Trivie Website
projects.description: I handled the planning, design, and implementation of the Trivie website. This site provides both information about the company as well as a portal for signing up for multiple Trivie for Business SaaS plans.

projects.title: Jiffy Lube Marketing Portal
projects.description: A portal system for Jiffy Lube that allows franchise members to login and create promotions targeted towards their specific market needs. I developed the backend systems using a basic API that fed into an Angular powered front end.

projects.title: WeatherCaster
projects.description: The first nationally available mobile app created and distributed by the Belo Corporation. Initially launching to rave reviews on iPad only, it has since released on iPhone, iPod and Android. I was responsible for the creation of the promotional website, social branding, and several web view sections within the app itself.

projects.title: App Directory
projects.description: This project was created for Belo as a directory listing of mobile apps, separated by station. Each app page included details about the app and links to download. It was developed with a custom built, fully functional CMS for adding or managing each listed application.

projects.title: STATS Sports
projects.description: The STATS dashboard allows Belo’s news stations to generate STATS sports content within their hybrid mobile apps. The views could be generated for all major sports with several customization options are available. Score data updated automatically at the date and time the game occurred.

projects.title: ConnecTV Promo
projects.description: A promotional section created for Belo during a partnership with ConnecTV. This page was used within each station’s website and social sites.

projects.title: XML Generator
projects.description: This tool provides a means to generate an XML feed from the various sections setup within the Clickability CMS that powers Belo station’s websites. It features a variety of customization options for the title, list amount, etc. These feeds are then added into the station’s mobile apps to populate each article, slideshow, and video category.

projects.title: Ustream Player
projects.description: This template allows each Belo station broadcast a live video stream via the Ustream service. Belo has since migrated to a new streaming service so this has been depreciated.

projects.title: WCNC Traffic Map
projects.description: An interactive traffic maps using an open API feed from Traffic.com. Displays current traffic conditions around Charlotte, NC.

projects.title: Titan
projects.description: The follow up to my Minecraft adventure map series. I stepped up my game and brought a new level of design, gameplay, and story for players to enjoy. This hobby project took around 6 months to complete and has been played by some of the biggest Let's Play members in the Minecraft community.

projects.title: The Source
projects.description: A custom adventure map for the video game Minecraft. It provides a unique series of puzzles, challenges, and unique storyline for the player. I created this in my free time and it serves as an excellent example of my commitment and passion for design and development of all kinds.
